section.title: Configuring the HipChat Plugin
section.para: To configure the HipChat plugin you will need the following four pieces of information from your HipChat system.

listitem.para: The URL of your HipChat system.
A token providing permission to send notifications to your HipChat system.
The ID of the HipChat room you wish to send notifications to.
A HipChat user account. This account will be used to authenticate any incoming notifications from your &kw-hos; cloud.

section.para: Use the following instructions to obtain a token from your Hipchat system.

listitem.para: Log in to HipChat as the user account that will be used to authenticate the notifications.
Navigate to the following URL: https://<your_hipchat_system>/account/api. Replace <your_hipchat_system> with the fully-qualified-domain-name of your HipChat system.
Select the Create token option. Ensure that the token has the "SendNotification" attribute.

section.para: Use the following instructions to obtain the ID of a HipChat room.

listitem.para: Log in to HipChat as the user account that will be used to authenticate the notifications.
Select My account from the application menu.
Select the room that you want your notifications sent to.
Look for the API ID field in the room information. This is the room ID.
